content:
本件保存七年
C2-62- 1521
May 14, 2
MEMORANDUM
To : Mr. R. L. Hirshberg Program Officer, US AID/C
From : C. C. Chang
Original signed by Chief, Second Division C. C. Chang
Subject : Excess Equipment Project No. Y-99-AX(99-471)
Reference is made to the attached copies of SDC letter SDC- 5098 dated May 9, 1962 and NKA latter Mk-1487 dated May 8, 1962.
In the above letter, ADC requested that five compressors be procured. If you concur and they are available, please ini- tiate necessary action for acquisition and shipment to Taiwan.
Encl. copies of SDC and MKA letters.
cc: SDC
JGWhite (with copies of SDC and MKA letters)

paragraphs.content: To : Mr. R. L. Hirshberg Program Officer, US AID/C
Original signed by Chief, Second Division C. C. Chang
Subject : Excess Equipment Project No. Y-99-AX(99-471)
Reference is made to the attached copies of SDC letter SDC- 5098 dated May 9, 1962 and NKA latter Mk-1487 dated May 8, 1962.
In the above letter, ADC requested that five compressors be procured. If you concur and they are available, please ini- tiate necessary action for acquisition and shipment to Taiwan.
Encl. copies of SDC and MKA letters.
